class.name: MicrosphereInterpolatorTest

javadoc.text: Test case for the "microsphere projection" interpolator.

Test of interpolator for a plane. *

* y = 2 x1 - 3 x2 + 5

method.name: testLinearFunction2D
method.comment: Interpolating points in [-1, 1][-1, 1] by steps of 1.

javadoc.text:
Test of interpolator for a quadratic function. *

* y = 2 x12 - 3 x22 * + 4 x1 x2 - 5

method.name: testParaboloid2D
method.comment: Interpolating points in [-10, 10][-10, 10] by steps of 2.
